bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of blood of a fresh, red color leaving with the stools. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu lian 木 蓮 quoting Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 6: 大便鮮血 , 臍腹疼痛 , “Stools with fresh blood. Navel and abdomen are in pain”, writes: 大便鮮血 , 疼痛肛出 , “Stools with fresh blood. A painful prolapse of the rectum”. Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 writes: 下鮮 血 , “ Discharge of fresh blood ”.
